name: The Living Word (IAPSOP)
content:
The Living Word (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Living Word Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Living Word, The. Devoted to the Vital Principles That Heal the Sick and Restore Souls to Life. 1912? Monthly Coolidge Corner/Brookline, MA . Publisher: Eloist Ministry. Editor: Walter DeVoe, Pauline DeVoe. Succeeds: Vitality Succeeded by: Religion—>Inspiration 1/1, July 1912 (?) 24 pp. On DeVoe and the Eloist Ministry, see the notes under Religion, and Inspiration. Issues:Living Word N84 Mar 1919 Living Word N85 Apr 1919 Living Word N87 Jun 1919 Living Word N89 Sep 1919 Living Word N90 Oct 1919 Living Word N93 Jan 1920 Living Word N96 Apr 1920 Living Word N99 Jul-aug 1920 Living Word N101 Nov-dec 1920
